ideath scratch doc. what you want, [one who sleeps with mothers|you, who sleeps with mothers]?

these: [adoxograph] | [banjax] | [bongy] | [Chihuahua Grub] | [cilice] | [coffy] | [Cow of Doom] | [dannye] | [dustfromamoth] | [eldritch] | [equinoctial] | [Evil Catullus] | [f1r3br4nd] | [Filthy Ike] | [halspal] | [hesby] | [heyoka] | [Gone Jackal] | [Gritchka] | [icicle] | [Jinmyo] | [JudyT] | [junkpile] | [lawnjart] | [loinen] | [mikl-em] | [mills] | [mistero] | [nexxus] | [Ouroboros] | [pukesick] | [qousqous] | [riverrun] | [taschenrechner] | [TheDeadguy] | [the gilded frame] | [ToasterLeavings] | [wharfinger] :them

I think i'm gaining, have gained, some immunity to gin. This is in no way a good thing.
[Dialogue with Rich]

([thing]) by [ideath] (i'm trying to decide if this is worth a node)

verbal conversation trigger: [my new glasses are green]. [email conversation] follows:

Broccoli green? [Emerald green]? Billiard green?

leprechaun green. they were actually [transparent] when i got them, but then i hadda couple of leprechauns and thought it would be kinda [neat] to see what color i could get if i squashed them.

Minced leprechauns, mmm, I’m getting hungry.

[mince]? nope. just [squash]ed.

Sorry, my bad. Did they yelp or squirt?

depends if you surprise them. they [crunch], but sometimes they make a hey-mmmph! sound.

WeRe tHeY cARryiNg liTtlE sUItcAsEs wiTh theM?

why? are you missing some [leprechaun]s?

Two ra n aw ay a wh il e b ack... .Tobias and Lenny. T h ey p acke d in th e mid dle of t he ni g ht a nd wer e gon e in th e a. m. N o o n e e l se s e em s to k n ow w h ere t hey we nt to....

node.title: the Forgotten Works and bits of rusty metal.
